titles.title: Tennessee Wilderness Act of 2010
A bill to designate as wilderness certain public land in the Cherokee National Forest in the State of Tennessee, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: 6/9/2010--Introduced. Tennessee Wilderness Act of 2010 - Designates specified federal lands in Cherokee National Forest in Tennessee as wilderness and as additions to the National Wilderness Preservation System (NWPS).
